Title: Relates to sexual harassment training and penalties for lobbyists
Summary: Establishes that no lobbyist shall commit an act of sexual harassment while engaging in lobbying or lobbying activities.
LawCode: Amd §§1-c, 1-o & 1-r, rel §§1-u & 1-v to be §§1-w & 1-x, add §§1-u & 1-v, Leg L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the legislative law, in relation to sexual harassment training and penalties for lobbyists
